name: Fel Defender
description:
The cooldown of 

<spec>Havoc</spec>
<dynamic>Blur - Blur</dynamic>

<spec>Vengeance</spec>
<dynamic>Fiery Brand</dynamic>

 is reduced by <dynamic>10 sec</dynamic>.

name: Viscous Ink
description:
Demonic Wards 

<spec>Vengeance</spec>
<dynamic>also - also</dynamic>

reduces magic damage taken by 

<spec>Havoc</spec>
<dynamic>an additional</dynamic>

<dynamic>8%</dynamic>.

name: Shattered Restoration
description: The healing of Shattered Souls is increased by <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic>.

name: Felfire Haste
description:
Your movement speed is increased by <dynamic>5% - 20%</dynamic> after casting 

<spec>Havoc</spec>
<dynamic>Fel Rush</dynamic>

<spec>Vengeance</spec>
<dynamic>Infernal Strike</dynamic>

name: Ravenous Consumption
description: Consume Magic has a <dynamic>15% - 30%</dynamic> to dispel a second effect.

name: Demonic Parole
description: Enemies that leave your Imprison are snared by 50% for <dynamic>10 sec - 40 sec</dynamic>.

name: Lost in Darkness
description: Increases the duration of Spectral Sight by <dynamic>3 sec - 10 sec</dynamic>.

name: Demon's Touch
description: Demon's Bite increases the damage of other abilities by <dynamic>5% - 16.67%</dynamic>.

name: Dancing with Fate
description: Blade Dance has a <dynamic>5% - 20%</dynamic> chance to apply Essence Break.

name: Serrated Glaive
description: Targets hit by Throw Glaive take <dynamic>8% - 15%</dynamic> increased damage from Eye Beam.

name: Growing Inferno
description: Immolation Aura's damage is increases by an additional <dynamic>5% - 12.5%</dynamic> each time it deals damage.

name: Soul Furnace
description: Every 10 Soul Fragments you consume increases the damage of your next Soul Cleave  by <dynamic>15% - 30%</dynamic>.

name: Demon Muzzle
description: Sigil of Silence reduces magic damage done to you by <dynamic>5% - 20%</dynamic> when it ends.

name: Roaring Fire
description: Fel Devastation heals for an additional <dynamic>0% - 0%</dynamic> based on your missing health.

name: Repeat Decree
description: Elysian Decree echoes a second sigil 1 second later for <dynamic>50% - 36.36%</dynamic> damage.

name: Increased Scrutiny
description: Reduce the cooldown of Sinful Brand by <dynamic>1 sec - 15 sec</dynamic>.

name: Brooding Pool
description: Increase the duration of Fodder to the Flame by <dynamic>5 sec - 20 sec</dynamic>.
